azurerm_database_migration_service.description: Manage a Azure Database Migration Service.

name.description: Specify the name of the database migration service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group in which to create the database migration service. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

subnet_id.description: The ID of the virtual subnet resource to which the database migration service should be joined. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

sku_name.description: The sku name of the database migration service. Possible values are `Premium_4vCores`, `Standard_1vCores`, `Standard_2vCores` and `Standard_4vCores`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assigned to the resource.

id.description: The ID of Database Migration Service.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management API.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management API.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management API.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management API.
